H0.text: If I sail on the Neva river past the Hermitage Museum, what city am I in. Stockholm, Sweden

H1.text: If I sail on the Neva river past the Hermitage Museum, what city am I in. Copenhagen, Denmark

H2.text: If I sail on the Neva river past the Hermitage Museum, what city am I in. Warsaw, Poland

H3.text: If I sail on the Neva river past the Hermitage Museum, what city am I in. RU-SPE

A4.text: The Hermitage Museum is located in Saint Petersburg, facing Palace Square.

A5.text: Saint Petersburg is situated on the River Neva, at the head of the Gulf of Finland.
